name: No More Cute Kitten
description:
Project created during the "WonderJam UQAC Automne 2022" regarding the theme "It's not a glitch, it's a feature". Our chosen styles are Combat and Stealth. 

The game can be played by fighting the enemies (red cats or blue one which are cops) or even by dodging them, it is completely up to the Player. Be careful! When you kill them, corpses have not to be found or the police will chase you.

Made by :

Team - Uncaffeinated Slow Fingers

Creators : 

David Laprise

Charles Wang

Alexandre Buzon

Timothé Lorin
